headline: American Water Works (AWK) Q2 Earnings Miss Estimates
summary: American Water Works (AWK) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -0.67% and +10.54%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: American Water Works (AWK) Q2 Earnings Miss Estimates
raw.summary: American Water Works (AWK) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -0.67% and +10.54%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: American Water Works: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: CAMDEN, N.J. (AP) — American Water Works (AWK) on Wednesday reported second-quarter profit of $289 million. The Camden, New Jersey-based company said it had profit of $1.48 per share. The results did not meet Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: American Water Works: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: CAMDEN, N.J. (AP) — American Water Works (AWK) on Wednesday reported second-quarter profit of $289 million. The Camden, New Jersey-based company said it had profit of $1.48 per share. The results did not meet Wall Street expectations.

summary: CAMDEN, N.J., July 30, 2025--American Water Works Company, Inc. (NYSE: AWK) today reported results for the quarter ended June 30, 2025, of $1.48 per share, compared to $1.42 per share for the same quarter in 2024 and $2.53 per share for the year-to-date period ended June 30, 2025, compared to $2.37 per share for the same period in 2024.

raw.summary: CAMDEN, N.J., July 30, 2025--American Water Works Company, Inc. (NYSE: AWK) today reported results for the quarter ended June 30, 2025, of $1.48 per share, compared to $1.42 per share for the same quarter in 2024 and $2.53 per share for the year-to-date period ended June 30, 2025, compared to $2.37 per share for the same period in 2024.

headline: American Water Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., July 30, 2025--American Water Works Company, Inc. (NYSE: AWK) announced that its board of directors today declared a quarterly cash dividend payment of $0.8275 per share of common stock, payable on September 3, 2025, to all shareholders of record as of August 12, 2025.
